name: Down Beneath
description:
Down Beneath is a short 3D horror game.

STORY

You find yourself in an unknown room. Find a way out, but beware... you are not alone.

CONTROLS

MOUSE Look W A S D Move SHIFT Run E Interact F Flashlight ESC Pause

NOTE

  • Encounter any bugs or bad grammar ? feel free to comments!
  • Sorry for my bad english

ANOTHER WAY TO SUPPORT ME
